Class RyCON

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.Main
      • de.ryanthara.ja.rycon.gui.MainApplication
        • RyCON

  • public class RyCON
extends MainApplication
    This class is the entry point of the program.

    This is used to show a nice name for Mac OS X users, because of there is still no Info.plist file used for RyCON. Maybe later on this will be changed.

    For more information see Apple documentation about java

    Because of the fact that there are a lot of user who has java version 6 or 7 running, RyCON uses no functions of java version 8 in versions lower than 2.

    Since:
    1
    Author:
    sebastian
